summary: Shane Bitney Crone's plans to marry Tom Bridegroom in California after the same-sex marriage law is passed takes a tragic turn when his partner of six years accidentally dies and Tom's family refuses Shane from attending the funeral.
cast: Cindy Bitney|David Crone|Jessica Mitchell|Lizzy Mohl|Judy Crone|Pat Managhan|Sasha Andreev|Chelsea Cannell|Rick Corner|Scott Davis|Jeanni Goldfarb|Paul Goretski|Allison Gray|Alexandra Grossi|Tami Kampf|Karen Jacobson|Erin Linsin|Coleen McMahon|Michaela Myers|Josh Lapour|Jelsa Paladino|Mark Runkle|Lizzy Sherman|Amanda Simpson|William Ngo|Thomas Bridegroom|Shane Bitney Crone|Ronnie Kerr
keywords: tearjerker|documentary footage|death of boyfriend|crowdfunded|grauman's chinese theatre los angeles
title: Bridegroom
